sentence.Network_en: When we bought the house, it was structurally sound.

sentence.Network_cn: 我们买下这幢房子时，房子的格局不错，但我还是决定全部重新装修。

entry.def: Structural means relating to or affecting the structure of something.

example.ex: The explosion caused little structural damage to the office towers themselves.
example.tran: 爆炸对办公大楼本身几乎没有造成结构上的损坏。
